name: Khel Khel Mein Foundation
briefDescription: Khel Khel Mein Foundation focuses on ensuring a structured platform for children to PLAY. We build upon the experience to nurture development in all aspects. We are currently spearheading one of the most ambitious sports interventions at grassroots through a unique model of PLAY. PERFORM. PROSPER. A child gets the opportunity to play multiple sports, perform in competitive league and learn crucial life skills through self-awareness and experiences of playing. Our vision is to foster a culture of sports which facilitates holistic growth of a child. We work in Delhi with low income schools and communities to create sustainable sports structures.Started in 2013-14 as a fellows initiated project at TFI; we are now an independent organization.
